author: 56cdab144f85abfb36c6c089
summary: Reads the last entry from a channel from [ThingSpeak](https://thingspeak.com)

ports.name: Read
ports.text: Reads the last value from ThingSpeak

ports.name: Channel ID
ports.text: The ID of the channel you want to read data from

ports.name: Read API Key
ports.text: Put in your read API key here

ports.name: When Finished
ports.text: Triggered when the read-command finished and the API sent some data back

ports.name: Last Entry
ports.text: The last entry from your ThingSpeak channel

ports.name: Success
ports.text: Whether or not the call was successful
